fields.name: Description
fields.value: A burst hero who provides massive attack increase and damage immunity to friendly troops in the battle opening

fields.name: Arena Troops
fields.value: Rhino Knight, Witchcraft Totem, Voodoo Dolls, Peltasts, Taurus Witchers, Pirate Ship, Priest Mage, Ballista, Undead Soldier, Magic Apprentice, Ghost Assassins
